  • Method Details

    • isRoomAvailable

      public boolean isRoomAvailable(int index, int startTime, int endTime)
      Checks if a room is available in an given interval
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the room
      startTime - at what time the event should start
      endTime - at what time the event ends
      Returns:
      returns true if rooms[index] is available for hosting the event, otherwise false

    • addInterval

      public void addInterval(int index, int startTime)
      Adds a specific interval to a room to mark it at occupied in that period of time
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the room in which an event should be inserted
      startTime - the start time of the event which will take place in rooms[index]

    • findRoom

      public boolean findRoom(Event event, int eventNumber)
      A method for finding a room in which a specific event to take place
      Parameters:
      event - the event who needs a room in which to take place
      eventNumber - the position of the event in the events[] array
      Returns:
      returns true if an available room for hosting the event was found, otherwise returns false

    • solve

      public Solution solve()
      The method who offers a solution for the problem
      Specified by:
      solve in class Algorithm
      Returns:
      returns an instance on Solution class in case it exists
